title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 342.6 - Comptroller's authority to extend filing period for disability retirement options where no effective option on file
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 342.6 - Comptroller's authority to extend filing period for disability retirement options where no effective option on file

State Regulations

Notwithstanding any other provision of this part, the

Comptroller, for reasonable cause, shall have power to extend the time for the
election of an option, for a period or periods which shall expire not later
than 60 days immediately after the mailing by the Comptroller of notification
of approval of retirement on account of disability. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2

342.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
